sentences.sContent: If you drive to work, park at the far end of the parking lot.
sentences.sCn: 如果你开车上班，那么就将汽车泊在停车场的最远端。

sentences.sContent: They emerged from the darkness and gathered like pilgrims, lining up beneath floodlights in the parking lot.
sentences.sCn: 他们从暗处冒出，像朝圣者一样汇聚在一起，在停车场的强光灯下排队。

sentences.sContent: Sitting in our usual parking lot, I was holding my book, watching her over the top of it.
sentences.sCn: 我们像往常一样在那个停车场里坐着，我拿了本书，从书的上边向她望去。

trans.tranOther: an open area for cars to park in
